name: Rehabilitation Training Technical Assistance Centers
objective: To increase the number and quality of employment outcomes for individuals with disabilities through training and technical assistance to State Vocational Rehabilitation (VR) agency personnel.
sub_agency_name: Office of Special Education and Rehabilitative Services
applicant_types: Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: The Department made two new awards under the Rehabilitation Training Technical Assistance Centers program in FY 2020.
The Department made two continuation awards under the Rehabilitation Training Technical Assistance Centers program in FY 2021.
The Department made two continuation awards under the Rehabilitation Training Technical Assistance Centers program in FY 2022.

authorizations.text: III, 302, Rehabilitation Act of 1973, as amended.

rules_regulations: The Office of Management and Budget Guidelines to Agencies on Governmentwide Debarment and Suspension (Nonprocurement) in 2 C.F.R. part 180; the Uniform Administrative Requirements, Cost Principles, and Audit Requirements for Federal Awards in 2 C.F.R. part 200; the regulations for this program in 34 C.F.R. parts 385.
